code: @Override public void setAsText(String text) throws IllegalArgumentException {     String[] array = StringUtils.delimitedListToStringArray(text, this.separator, this.charsToDelete).     if (this.trimValues) {         array = StringUtils.trimArrayElements(array).     }     if (this.emptyArrayAsNull && array.length == 0) {         setValue(null).     } else {         setValue(array).     } }
